mapper.select: SELECT p.position_id, p.amount, p.symbol, a.account_id, a.balance, a.account_num FROM position p JOIN account a ON p.account_id = a.account_id WHERE p.position_id = #{position_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO position (amount, symbol, account_id) VALUES (#{amount}, #{symbol}, #{account.accountId})
mapper.update: UPDATE position SET amount = #{amount}, symbol = #{symbol}, account_id = #{account.accountId} WHERE position_id = #{positionId}
